We've had our arguments, we've also been in the verge of breaking up a lot of times but somehow we've always made up and today when you're here I want you to remind yourself of all those times when we've been happy and at peace because of each other.

title: Open when we're in the middle of a fight.
textContentHtml:
I'm sorry that I made you come here, but I want you to read this when you feel that you don't want to talk to me anymore because that's when I want you to communicate the most! 

We've had our arguments, we've also been in the verge of breaking up a lot of times but somehow we've always made up and today when you're here I want you to remind yourself of all those times when we've been happy and at peace because of each other. 


Think of the times when you know how happy your presence makes me, which in turn gives you happiness ðŸ¤§ And not just that, I need you to remember that how much I love you, and that is why I care and expect certain things, you should know that you matter a lot to me, and your nonchalant behaviour can hurt me, 'your suvi' (the one you wish to make the happiest) and I know you'd never want to do that, so please try to talk to me and understand my pov and I promise to behave all calm and understanding ðŸ˜­
